meaningMnemonic:
The radicals ground and big make up this radical. There's a big guy on the ground... who is that big guy? Embarrassingly, it's your <radical>husband</radical>. Feel the shame that he got knocked down on the ground. By what? Who? How? (It doesn't matter.)

Don't confuse this with 未 (jet), though. See how 未 has a little tail at the end? That's because jets and other planes have tails, while husbands don't. At least I'd sure hope yours doesn't.
